name: Avocado Soup With Salsa
keywords: appetizer, avocado, salsa, vegetable stock, yogurt, low calorie, raw, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 cup tomato salsa or 3/4 cup chopped watercress leaves and plum tomatoes, for garnis

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and pit avocados; cut chunks into a food processor. Add lemon juice and yogurt, and process. Add 1 cup stock; then, gradually add more until soup is thinned to desired consistency. Add salt and Tabasco to taste. Transfer to a bowl, cover and chill 2 hours or overnight.
To serve, stir well, ladle into bowls and garnish with a spoonful of salsa or watercress and tomatoes.
